kpi.name: Proportion of Sales Outside of Japan
kpi.footnote: *Proportion of sales outside of Japan to total sales

kpi.name: Proportion of Hardware Sales
kpi.footnote: *Proportion of hardware (including accessories) sales to total dedicated video game platform sales

kpi.name: Proportion of First Party Software Sales
kpi.footnote: *Proportion of first-party software sales to total dedicated video game platform software sales

kpi.name: Digital Sales in dedicated video game platform
kpi.footnote: *Digital sales include (a) downloadable version of packaged software (the downloadable version of software that is offered both physically and digitally), (b) download-only software, (c) add-on content and (d) Nintendo Switch Online, etc.

kpi.name: Proportion of Digital Sales
kpi.footnote: *Proportion of digital sales to total dedicated video game software sales

kpi.name: Proportion of Downloadable Versions of Packaged Software Sales
kpi.footnote: *Proportion of downloadable versions of packaged software sales to total digital sales as indicated above: a/(a+b+c+d)
